WHY AM I SO SENSITIVE?

I have spent 40 days and 40 nights labouring infront of the glowing light of my laptop.

tap tap tapping my thick sausage fingers away at my cheeto covered keyboard.

Not a single line of javascript, no CSS frameworks, no backends.

Just pure plain HTML and raging passion for the craft.

All for what? So you can disrespect me like this?

whatever, man
